SELECT
v_tag.id as id, v_tag.tag as tag, v_tag.cnt as articleCount,
FROM r_article_tag LEFT JOIN v_tag ON r_article_tag.tag_id = v_tag.id
r_article_tag.article_id = #{articleBean.id} AND r_article_tag.del_flg = '0'

SELECT count(v_comic.id) FROM r_article_tag JOIN v_comic ON r_article_tag.article_id = v_comic.id
AND r_article_tag.tag_id = #{tagBean.id} AND r_article_tag.del_flg = '0' AND v_comic.publishFlg = '1' and ( v_comic.redFlg = '0' OR v_comic.redFlg is NULL
OR v_comic.redFlg = '1' )
and (v_comic.`translateFlg` = '1' OR v_comic.`translateFlg` is NULL)

SELECT
v_comic.id as id, v_comic.title as title, v_comic.description as description, v_comic.publishFlg as publishFlg, v_comic.publishDate as publishDate, v_comic.recommendFlg as recommendFlg, v_comic.redFlg as redFlg, v_comic.translateFlg as translateFlg, v_comic.`userBean.id` as `userBean.id`, v_comic.`userBean.nickname` as `userBean.nickname`, v_comic.`userBean.signature` as `userBean.signature`, v_comic.accessCount as accessCount, v_comic.likeCount as likeCount, v_comic.commentCount as commentCount,
FROM r_article_tag JOIN v_comic ON r_article_tag.article_id = v_comic.id
AND r_article_tag.tag_id = #{tagBean.id} AND r_article_tag.del_flg = '0' AND v_comic.publishFlg = '1' and ( v_comic.redFlg = '0' OR v_comic.redFlg is NULL
OR v_comic.redFlg = '1' )
and (v_comic.`translateFlg` = '1' OR v_comic.`translateFlg` is NULL)
order by v_comic.id desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(v_music.id) FROM r_article_tag JOIN v_music ON r_article_tag.article_id = v_music.id
AND r_article_tag.tag_id = #{tagBean.id} AND r_article_tag.del_flg = '0' AND v_music.publishFlg = '1'

SELECT
v_music.id as id, v_music.title as title, v_music.description as description, v_music.publishFlg as publishFlg, v_music.recommendFlg as recommendFlg, v_music.`userBean.id` as `userBean.id`, v_music.`userBean.nickname` as `userBean.nickname`, v_music.accessCount as accessCount, v_music.likeCount as likeCount, v_music.commentCount as commentCount,
FROM r_article_tag JOIN v_music ON r_article_tag.article_id = v_music.id
AND r_article_tag.tag_id = #{tagBean.id} AND r_article_tag.del_flg = '0' AND v_music.publishFlg = '1'
order by v_music.id desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
